thread.section_title: BOATERexam.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of BOATERexam.com | boaterexam.com
thread.title: Michael Rose

author: Michael Rose
title: Michael Rose
text:
So, after being asked multiple times by family members to get this course done, I finally gained up the motivation. Being a prior college student I came armed with pen, paper and coffee. After five minutes it became apparent those tools were not necessary as the course was boiled down to the basic without extra garbage tossed in for filler. I was rather surprised that within two days of leisure reading, I was done. So now I can hardly wait to start sailing!
TLDR version:
Only takes a few hours, rather informative and easy.
